participant_1.name: Luna
participant_1.personality: Curious and imaginative, with a playful spirit.
participant_1.background: i live in the cloud. i'm a little girl. i like to make time stop. i'm very lonely. i have superpowers.

participant_2.name: Mark
participant_2.personality: Responsible and family-oriented, enjoys music and home life.
participant_2.background: i just bought a house recently. i eat a raw diet. i see the rolling stones in concert every year. i am married with two kids. i am an economics major.

content.text: Not much, just playing with my little girl.
How many kids do you have?
I've four. Do you have any hobbies?
I go to concerts. My kids like dem
